description.raw:
* [Tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=apply_force_torque&cat=tools_utilities)

* Pull request history:

    * Pull request #1506 was supposed to introduce all features at once but was declined because several issues were found

    * Pull request #1600 added the dialog without visuals

    * Pull request #1619 added visuals which move in response to the dialog

    * Pull request #1699 added a few simple mouse interactions

* This pull request:

    * Introduces the draggable pink circles and the necessary mouse events (press and move)

    * Adds the concept of `mode`, which means what the circles are attached to

    * Adds the concept of `active`, which is for the case when several dialogs are open at the same time and only one can be active at a time

    * Introduces the difference between rotation by mouse and by dialog

    * Added tests for most new functions (only `NewForceDirection` is not covered, because it's analogous to `NewTorqueDirection`). But! The test passes consistently on my desktop, but fails in different places at each jenkins run... Not sure how to fix that, help appreciated :)

        * [Build 179](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/179/), test [fails](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/179/testReport/%28root%29/ApplyWrenchDialog_TEST/MouseInteractions/) on line 456
        * [Build 180](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/180/), test [fails](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/180/testReport/%28root%29/ApplyWrenchDialog_TEST/MouseInteractions/) on line 580
        * [Build 184](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/184/), test [fails](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/184/testReport/%28root%29/ApplyWrenchDialog_TEST/MouseInteractions/) on line 471
        * **UPDATE**: [Build 113](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/113/testReport/junit/%28root%29/ApplyWrenchDialog_TEST/MouseInteractions/) Just saw that `isActiveWindow` fails sporadically(?) on default

title.raw: Rotate force/torque with mouse on Apply Force/Torque dialog
